title: Listen to what RPF constable Chetan Singh is saying after open firing on Jaipur-Mumbai train and killing his senior Tikaram Meena and 3 passengers (Abdul Kadir, Asgar Kai and an identified man).
selftext:
A source from Western Railway in Mumbai told 
@IndianExpress
, a fight had allegedly broken out following an argument over communities.

According to Indian Express report, Chetan Singh fired on ASI Tikaram Meena from his ARM Rifle first inside the B-5 coach and then shot at Abdul Kadir, who was from Madhubani. He later killed an unidentified man in the pantry car, and moved to the S-6 coach where he shot Asgar Kai, a bangle seller from Jaipur.
